mapper.select: select * from product order by product_id=#{productId}
mapper.insert: insert into product(product_name, product_price, product_qty, create_at) VALUES (#{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productQTY}, now());
mapper.update: update product set product_name=#{productName}, product_price=#{productPrice}, product_qty=#{productQTY} where product_id=#{productId}
